name: DOOMpad
description:
I did not expect this to blow up! This was just a quick joke I made for me!

The trickery I was doing ended up straight up not working reliably on other people's machines - specifically, certain input keys would get dropped through Notepad. Like the "select option" one, lol.

(there are ways around it, and i leave that as an exercise to you!)

I'm removing all of it and releasing a version with DOOM popped out to another window, visible, behind Notepad, and mirrored in Notepad. Which is disappointing, but a fun magic trick doesn't get less special when you know how it works - it gets more approachable!

 A quick framework for making Notepad games yourself will be soon after.

Have fun!

Oh also, Windows 100% thinks this is a virus, and it's not, but like... I guess just trust me?
================================================

WARNING: IT FLASHES A LOT. SO. PROBABLY BAD FOR EPILEPSY.
